# description

**Instance Property**

A string describing the extensions availability.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Accessing Availability Information

- **totalCount**: The number of extensions not yet approved for hosting by the current app.
- **disabledCount**: The number of extensions disabled for hosting in the current app.
- **enabledCount**: The number of extensions enabled for hostng in the current app.
- **unapprovedCount**: The number of extensions not yet approved for hosing by the current app

items.description: The number of extensions not yet approved for hosting by the current app.
items.name: totalCount

items.description: The number of extensions disabled for hosting in the current app.
items.name: disabledCount

items.description: The number of extensions enabled for hostng in the current app.
items.name: enabledCount

items.description: The number of extensions not yet approved for hosing by the current app
items.name: unapprovedCount
